properties.areaDesc: Brown, OH; Highland, OH; Clermont, OH
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 12:29PM EST until January 11 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington OH
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Central Clermont County in southwestern Ohio...
Northwestern Brown County in southwestern Ohio...
Southwestern Highland County in southwestern Ohio...

* Until 100 PM EST.

* At 1228 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over New
Richmond, moving northeast at 50 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines.

* Locations impacted include...
Amelia, Mount Orab, New Richmond, Williamsburg, Batavia,
Owensville, Newtonsville, Fayetteville, St. Martin, Chasetown,
Lindale, Greenbush, East Fork State Park, Buford, Nicholsville,
Blairsville, State Route 32 at US Route 68, Bantam and Lake
Lorelei.
properties.instruction:
For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and
submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
